name: Chaotic Entropy
title: Sucrose: Chaotic Entropy
desc: The wild winds gather â€” and amidst the chaos, victory.
in_play_description: After the Large Wind Spirit created by your Sucrose, who had this card equipped, has converted to another Elemental Type: Deal +1 DMG of this Elemental Type.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Sucrose to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: Combat Action: When your active character is Sucrose, equip this card. After Sucrose equips this card, immediately use Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II once. After the Large Wind Spirit created by your Sucrose, who had this card equipped, has converted to another Elemental Type: Deal +1 DMG of this Elemental Type. (You must have Sucrose in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
